Texts.Eng: A fridge! I wonder what bad guyss eat for breakfast?
All life readings emanate from a great depth below the surface. The readings are... Difficult to define. Congratulations in advance for your courage.
Amused. Perhaps they eat... Bad apples? Ho ho! My wit is impeccable!
Best to look around for a way in while he's sleeping, dear. We wouldn't want to worry him.
Big Ape is a profoundly dangerous enemy.
Bio readings show many lifesigns in these tunnels. 97% hostile. I commend your valour.
Careful down there. Every creature and substance you encounter is bound to be hostile...
Conventional weapons have an estimated 0% chance of damaging the Erchius crystal. You are invited to devise another means of attack.
Current exterior pressure reading 15 quash. Scans show this structure is capable of withstanding in excess of 80 quash. Chance of survival - surprisingly high.
Don't keep me waiting, "Protector".
Don't tell them what to do, fishface! They've dealt with situations way worse than this before!
Don't worry about it! Murderous strangers are totally your sspeciality.
Erchius readings have reached 101 rad. Your current Peril level is 18,472 morts...
Erchius readings have reached 94 rad. You are in peril. Your Peril level is currently 14,607 morts.
Esther Bright
Evidence indicates these entities are not yet fully mature; there is a high likelihood that they are only freshly hatched. You appear to have stumbled into a nest.
Having analysed the data, I conclude it should have been impossible to reach this room alive. Congratulations on your stubborn perseverance in the face of reason!
He may have a few screws loose, dear, but he's not dangerous.
Hush! You're not helping.
I applaud your tenacious moxie in the pursuit of complex goals.
I detect both Erchius chemical signatures and human DNA in these entities. High likelihood of behavioural volatility predicted.
I don't like the look of any of this, partner.
I think this is it, dear. I hope you're ready...
I've heard of these cultists, but I know little about them... I wonder if...? Who can say.
I. Hate. Fire.
Impressed. Despite their deeds, these loathsome cultists at least know how to keep a privy chamber spotless! Ha ha!
Is that the legendary Esther Bright on your communication line, partner?! Ma'm, it is an honour to meet you!
It appears lockdown has been instigated. You must locate a breaker to restore full power. Please proceed with caution in conditions of low light.
It is fortunate that our enemy's flying fortress has such weak security protocols.
It looks like we can make a positive impact on the rebel war against oppression! Wonderful. Every little helps.
It looks like you can, um, summon your mech with this platform. That should be useful in your current excursion.
It's going to explode! Get out!
Lana Blake
Let's see your mighty fine hackin' skills, partner!
Look at them; prolonged contact with the Erchius crystals seems to have denatured their very being! The poor creatures have lost themselves completely.
Looks like we've coincided with a rebel attack against the Miniknog. I think this will be advantageous to both them and us, dear.
May Kluex guide you.
My scanners have just detected another guard... And another one.
Oh Asra, when will your obsession with the Ruin end?
Oh. It's ^orange;you^white;.
Path split detected. I would advise taking neither the right nor the left path. Regrettably, this is not an option.
Previous data would imply that a temple this ancient could not maintain a security system this deadly... Recalibrating Intimation Parameters.
Readings indicate that while this structure would appear to be a planet, it is in fact one giant living organism.
Readings show that there is a vast chasm beneath you that extends fathoms deep. I advise you to try and avoid falling to your death.
SAIL's right, there's a void just under your feet; a huge gap between you and the central structure of the Ruin. You're going to have to figure out a safe way to get down.
Scans show this facility is densely defended by heavily armed guards, patrolling on every level.
So you've found her... You've found Asra.
Sorry about the AI, dear.
That woman... Her voice... Could it be, after all this time?
The pleasure is all mine, dear!
There are strange life signs down here in the depths of the lab.
There is another barricade above ground sustained by this shielded generator. I believe if you shut down the shields you can then disable the power, causing the barricade to drop.
There is enough Erchius here to fully repair the ship.
These ruins are ancient and appear to be sacred to the Floran. Readings show they are also dark and ominous.
This is a linked circuit: lowering this barricade has lowered a corresponding one above ground.
This is a well established stronghold of the Miniknog... I know you're always sensibly cautious, dear, but I think this time extra care should be taken...
This island is home to the "Grand Pagoda Library" entrance.
This keep belongs to a Glitch known as the Baron. He is a retired hero, and by all accounts a little... Eccentric...
This place is sort of homely... Minus the abominable spikes of course. Obviously...
This substance is organic. Analysis is inconclusive, but it would take a fairly large creature to produce this much matter.
Well done!
What a feisty Floran! Reminds me of myself when I was younger, though I had fewer leaves.
Whatever these Floran are pursuing is obviously of grave importance to them. They're worse than me on a bug hunt! Be careful, dear.
Whose communication channel is this?! Why are you aboard the Dantalion?!
Why, it's big enough to rival the greatest of Kluex's divine temples!
You are now approaching the basement level. My readings are distorted but I can estimate your Peril level if you wish...
You did it! ...But something's wrong. The Ruin... Its structure is unstable!
You have to AVOID it! You can't sstab it! You can't shoot it! You just have to sskulk around and hope it doesn't notice you.
You're makin' good progress, partner. This ship sure is vast, ain't it?
You're standing on the Ruin, dear. You can't do much damage on its surface - you'll have to work your way down into it.
You've reached the Ruin's heart. You must destroy it.
